job_history.role_name: Director of Information Technology and Analytics
job_history.work_description: Directed the firm's word-wide Information Technology strategy. Established and instituted policies, procedures and technology to mitigate corporate security risk and position ZAIS for Sarbanes-Oxley act compliance. Identified process improvement opportunities and recommended solutions and budget requirements to management committee. Managed team of 6 resources responsible for technology management and support operations encompassing all aspects of IT infrastructure including workstations, server platforms, IP telephony, L3 network infrastructure, network security, disaster recovery, Storage Area Networks and videoconferencing.

Directed hardware and software configuration, installation, troubleshooting, and support activities. Oversaw administration of network infrastructure, business systems, cabling and circuits, and telecommunications platforms. Established and managed relationships with technology vendors and service providers. Monitored and tracked call volumes, service requests, and performance metrics.

Administered and supported 250 client node Windows NT environment. Planned, configured and administered the upgrade of Windows NT to Windows 2000. Maintained DNS, WINS and DHCP in multi-site environment. Maintained 85 node development server environment. Engineered and deployed System Management Server 2.0 infrastructure.
Oversee and modify the daily download of data from several distributors. Uploaded data to appropriate SQL databases. Maintained and perform hardware/software upgrades on Windows FTP servers.

skills.name: IT Strategy
skills.explanation: Directed the firm's worldwide Information Technology strategy, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: IT Management
skills.explanation: Managed teams of up to 6 resources responsible for technology management and support operations, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Network Administration

skills.name: System Administration
skills.explanation: Administered and supported various systems, including Windows NT, Windows 2000, and SQL databases, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Disaster Recovery
skills.explanation: Managed disaster recovery operations, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Security Risk Management
skills.explanation: Established and instituted policies and procedures to mitigate corporate security risk, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership

skills.name: SQL
